001package net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.loss;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.common.numbers.JavaNumberTypeSupport;
004import net.tvburger.jdl.common.patterns.StaticUtility;
005import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.ObjectiveFunction;
006
007/**
008 * Provides commonly used {@link ObjectiveFunction} implementations as
009 * reusable, static singletons.
010 *
011 * <p>
012 * The {@code Losses} class serves as a convenience utility for retrieving
013 * standard objective functions such as Mean Squared Error (MSE) and Binary
014 * Cross-Entropy (BCE). These functions are frequently used in optimization
015 * and machine learning tasks, making them natural defaults for training
016 * pipelines.
017 */
018@StaticUtility
019public final class Objectives {
020
021    private Objectives() {
022    }
023
024    /**
025     * Returns the shared Mean Squared Error (MSE) objective function.
026     *
027     * @return the predefined MSE {@link ObjectiveFunction}
028     */
029    public static <N extends Number> ObjectiveFunction<N> mSE(JavaNumberTypeSupport<N> typeSupport) {
030        N scale = typeSupport.divide(typeSupport.one(), typeSupport.add(typeSupport.one(), typeSupport.one()));
031        return ObjectiveFunction.minimize(new MeanError<>(typeSupport), new MeanError<>(typeSupport), new ScaledError<>(typeSupport, scale, new SquaredError<>(typeSupport)));
032    }
033
034    /**
035     * Returns the shared Summed Squared Error (SSE) objective function.
036     *
037     * @return the predefined SSE {@link ObjectiveFunction}
038     */
039    public static <N extends Number> ObjectiveFunction<N> sSE(JavaNumberTypeSupport<N> typeSupport) {
040        N scale = typeSupport.divide(typeSupport.one(), typeSupport.add(typeSupport.one(), typeSupport.one()));
041        return ObjectiveFunction.minimize(new SummedError<>(typeSupport), new SummedError<>(typeSupport), new ScaledError<>(typeSupport, scale, new SquaredError<>(typeSupport)));
042    }
043
044    /**
045     * Returns the shared Binary Cross-Entropy (BCE) objective function.
046     *
047     * @return the predefined BCE {@link ObjectiveFunction}
048     */
049    public static <N extends Number> ObjectiveFunction<N> bCE(JavaNumberTypeSupport<N> typeSupport) {
050        return ObjectiveFunction.minimize(new MeanError<>(typeSupport), new MeanError<>(typeSupport), new BinaryCrossEntropy<>(typeSupport));
051    }
052}
